DOC.brief_summary: Part I study compare pharmacokinetics MK-7655 , dose combination PRIMAXIN® ( imipenem + cilastatin ) , participant impair renal function match control participant . In Part II study , potential renal insufficiency affect non-renal clearance mechanism investigate .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Dose Study Investigate Pharmacokinetics MK-7655 Participants With Impaired Renal Function ( MK-7655-005 AM1 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Participants reproductive potential ( male female ) must willing use contraception . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≤40 kg/m^2 Weight > 60 kg screen visit No clinically significant abnormality electrocardiogram ( ECG ) screen visit and/or prior administration initial dose study drug Panels AD : smoker limit 10 cigarette per day . Panels EH : nonsmoker use nicotine least 6 month In good health ( stable health participant renal impairment ) Exclusion criterion Pregnant breastfeeding . History recent stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder History clinically significant endocrine , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hematological , immunological , respiratory , genitourinary abnormality diseases History malignant neoplastic disease . Exceptions : ( 1 ) adequately treat nonmelanomatous skin carcinoma carcinoma situ cervix ; ( 2 ) malignancy successfully treat ≥10 year prior screen visit Panels AD : Use medication ( prescription nonprescription ) herbal remedy ( St. John 's Wort [ Hypericum perforatum ] ) begin approximately 2 week ( 5 halflives ) prior administration initial dose study drug post study visit Panels EH : Use medication ( prescription nonprescription ) herbal remedy ( St. John 's Wort [ Hypericum perforatum ] ) inhibitors inducer CYP1A2 , CYP2C19 , CYP34A , substrates CYP2C19 , begin approximately 2 week ( 5 halflives ) prior administration probe cocktail , poststudy visit Consumption great 3 glass alcoholic beverage ( 1 glass approximately equivalent : beer [ 284 mL/10 ounce ] , wine [ 125 mL/4 ounce ] , distilled spirit [ 25 mL/1 ounce ] ) per day Consumption great 6 serving ( 1 serve approximately equivalent 120 mg caffeine ) coffee , tea , cola , caffeinated beverage per day Major surgery , donation loss 1 unit blood ( approximately 500 mL ) , participation another investigational study within 4 week prior screen visit History multiple and/or severe allergy ( include latex allergy ) , prior anaphylactic reaction intolerability prescription nonprescription drug food History hypersensitivity PRIMAXIN® IV beta lactam antibiotic ( include limited penicillin , cephalosporin , monobactams carbapenems ) Regular user ( include recreational use drug [ include alcohol ] ) within approximately 12 month screen visit History kidney removal and/or renal transplant History Clostridium difficile colitis know C. difficile colonization
